text: "Better Man" is a 2000 song by Robbie Williams. It was taken from his third studio album Sing When You're Winning and was only released in Australia, New Zealand and Mexico. It went to number 4 in New Zealand and number 6 in Australia. ==Track listing== Australian CD single # "Better Man" – 3:24 # "My Way" (live) – 4:35 # "Rolling Stone" – 3:43 # "Toxic" – 3:51 # "Let Love Be Your Energy" (video) – 4:18 == References == Category:2000 songs Category:Robbie Williams songs
title: Better Man (Robbie Williams song)
